Heavy Body.NAME: Heavy Body
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, choose a card in your hand and gain an effect based on its type.

Snecko Heart.NAME: Snecko Heart
Snecko Heart.FLAVOR: The body of a Snecko is surprisingly valuable and bountiful.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, if you have Confusion, draw 1 additional card.

Rigid Armor.NAME: Rigid Armor
Rigid Armor.FLAVOR: Action is unnecessary when nothing can threaten you.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, if you played 2 or less cards this turn, gain 2 Plated Armor.
